21// Compiler can turn on programmatical frame capture in release build by defining
22// ANGLE_METAL_FRAME_CAPTURE flag.
23#if defined(NDEBUG) && !defined(ANGLE_METAL_FRAME_CAPTURE)
24# define ANGLE_METAL_FRAME_CAPTURE_ENABLED 0
25#else
26# define ANGLE_METAL_FRAME_CAPTURE_ENABLED ANGLE_WITH_MODERN_METAL_API
27#endif
28
29namespace rx
30{
31
32namespace
33{
34
35#define ANGLE_TO_EGL_TRY(EXPR) \
36do \
37{ \
38 if (ANGLE_UNLIKELY((EXPR) != angle::Result::Continue)) \
39 { \
40 return egl::EglBadSurface(); \
41 } \
42} while (0)
43
44constexpr angle::FormatID kDefaultFrameBufferDepthFormatId = angle::FormatID::D32_FLOAT;
45constexpr angle::FormatID kDefaultFrameBufferStencilFormatId = angle::FormatID::S8_UINT;
46constexpr angle::FormatID kDefaultFrameBufferDepthStencilFormatId =
47 angle::FormatID::D24_UNORM_S8_UINT;
48
49angle::Result CreateOrResizeTexture(const gl::Context *context,
50 const mtl::Format &format,
51 uint32_t width,
52 uint32_t height,
53 uint32_t samples,
54 bool renderTargetOnly,
55 mtl::TextureRef *textureOut)
56{
57 ContextMtl *contextMtl = mtl::GetImpl(context);
58 bool allowFormatView = format.hasDepthAndStencilBits();
59 if (*textureOut)
60 {
61 ANGLE_TRY((*textureOut)->resize(contextMtl, width, height));
62 }
63 else if (samples > 1)
64 {
65 ANGLE_TRY(mtl::Texture::Make2DMSTexture(contextMtl, format, width, height, samples,
66 /** renderTargetOnly */ renderTargetOnly,
67 /** allowFormatView */ allowFormatView,
68 textureOut));
69 }
70 else
71 {
72 ANGLE_TRY(mtl::Texture::Make2DTexture(contextMtl, format, width, height, 1,
73 /** renderTargetOnly */ renderTargetOnly,
74 /** allowFormatView */ allowFormatView, textureOut));
75 }
76 return angle::Result::Continue;
77}
78
79ANGLE_MTL_UNUSED
80bool IsFrameCaptureEnabled()
81{
82#if !ANGLE_METAL_FRAME_CAPTURE_ENABLED
83 return false;
84#else
85 // We only support frame capture programmatically if the ANGLE_METAL_FRAME_CAPTURE
86 // environment flag is set. Otherwise, it will slow down the rendering. This allows user to
87 // finely control whether they want to capture the frame for particular application or not.
88 auto var = std::getenv("ANGLE_METAL_FRAME_CAPTURE");
89 static const bool enabled = var ? (strcmp(var, "1") == 0) : false;
90
91 return enabled;
92#endif
93}
94
95ANGLE_MTL_UNUSED
96std::string GetMetalCaptureFile()
97{
98#if !ANGLE_METAL_FRAME_CAPTURE_ENABLED
99 return "";
100#else
101 auto var = std::getenv("ANGLE_METAL_FRAME_CAPTURE_FILE");
102 const std::string filePath = var ? var : "";
103
104 return filePath;
105#endif
106}
107
108ANGLE_MTL_UNUSED
109size_t MaxAllowedFrameCapture()
110{
111#if !ANGLE_METAL_FRAME_CAPTURE_ENABLED
112 return 0;
113#else
114 auto var = std::getenv("ANGLE_METAL_FRAME_CAPTURE_MAX");
115 static const size_t maxFrames = var ? std::atoi(var) : 100;
116
117 return maxFrames;
118#endif
119}
120
121ANGLE_MTL_UNUSED
122size_t MinAllowedFrameCapture()
123{
124#if !ANGLE_METAL_FRAME_CAPTURE_ENABLED
125 return 0;
126#else
127 auto var = std::getenv("ANGLE_METAL_FRAME_CAPTURE_MIN");
128 static const size_t minFrame = var ? std::atoi(var) : 0;
129
130 return minFrame;
131#endif
132}
133
134ANGLE_MTL_UNUSED
135bool FrameCaptureDeviceScope()
136{
137#if !ANGLE_METAL_FRAME_CAPTURE_ENABLED
138 return false;
139#else
140 auto var = std::getenv("ANGLE_METAL_FRAME_CAPTURE_SCOPE");
141 static const bool scopeDevice = var ? (strcmp(var, "device") == 0) : false;
142
143 return scopeDevice;
144#endif
145}
146
147ANGLE_MTL_UNUSED
148std::atomic<size_t> gFrameCaptured(0);
149
150ANGLE_MTL_UNUSED
151void StartFrameCapture(id<MTLDevice> metalDevice, id<MTLCommandQueue> metalCmdQueue)
152{
153#if ANGLE_METAL_FRAME_CAPTURE_ENABLED
154 if (!IsFrameCaptureEnabled())
155 {
156 return;
157 }
158
159 if (gFrameCaptured >= MaxAllowedFrameCapture())
160 {
161 return;
162 }
163
164 MTLCaptureManager *captureManager = [MTLCaptureManager sharedCaptureManager];
165 if (captureManager.isCapturing)
166 {
167 return;
168 }
169
170 gFrameCaptured++;
171
172 if (gFrameCaptured < MinAllowedFrameCapture())
173 {
174 return;
175 }
176
177# ifdef __MAC_10_15
178 if (ANGLE_APPLE_AVAILABLE_XCI(10.15, 13.0, 13))
179 {
180 MTLCaptureDescriptor *captureDescriptor = [[MTLCaptureDescriptor alloc] init];
181 captureDescriptor.captureObject = metalDevice;
182 const std::string filePath = GetMetalCaptureFile();
183 if (filePath != "")
184 {
185 const std::string numberedPath =
186 filePath + std::to_string(gFrameCaptured - 1) + ".gputrace";
187 captureDescriptor.destination = MTLCaptureDestinationGPUTraceDocument;
188 captureDescriptor.outputURL =
189 [NSURL fileURLWithPath:[NSString stringWithUTF8String:numberedPath.c_str()]
190 isDirectory:false];
191 }
192 else
193 {
194 // This will pause execution only if application is being debugged inside Xcode
195 captureDescriptor.destination = MTLCaptureDestinationDeveloperTools;
196 }
197
198 NSError *error;
199 if (![captureManager startCaptureWithDescriptor:captureDescriptor error:&error])
200 {
201 NSLog(@"Failed to start capture, error %@", error);
202 }
203 }
204 else
205# endif // __MAC_10_15
206 if (ANGLE_APPLE_AVAILABLE_XCI(10.15, 13.0, 13))
207 {
208 MTLCaptureDescriptor *captureDescriptor = [[MTLCaptureDescriptor alloc] init];
209 captureDescriptor.captureObject = metalDevice;
210
211 NSError *error;
212 if (![captureManager startCaptureWithDescriptor:captureDescriptor error:&error])
213 {
214 NSLog(@"Failed to start capture, error %@", error);
215 }
216 }
217#endif // ANGLE_METAL_FRAME_CAPTURE_ENABLED
218}
219
220void StartFrameCapture(ContextMtl *context)
221{
222 StartFrameCapture(context->getMetalDevice(), context->cmdQueue().get());
223}
224
225void StopFrameCapture()
226{
227#if ANGLE_METAL_FRAME_CAPTURE_ENABLED
228 if (!IsFrameCaptureEnabled())
229 {
230 return;
231 }
232 MTLCaptureManager *captureManager = [MTLCaptureManager sharedCaptureManager];
233 if (captureManager.isCapturing)
234 {
235 [captureManager stopCapture];
236 }
237#endif
238}
239}
240
241SurfaceMtl::SurfaceMtl(DisplayMtl *display,
242 const egl::SurfaceState &state,
243 const egl::AttributeMap &attribs)
244 : SurfaceImpl(state)
245{
246 mRobustResourceInit =
247 attribs.get(EGL_ROBUST_RESOURCE_INITIALIZATION_ANGLE, EGL_FALSE) == EGL_TRUE;
248 mColorFormat = display->getPixelFormat(angle::FormatID::B8G8R8A8_UNORM);
249
250 mSamples = state.config->samples;
251
252 int depthBits = 0;
253 int stencilBits = 0;
254 if (state.config)
255 {
256 depthBits = state.config->depthSize;
257 stencilBits = state.config->stencilSize;
258 }
259
260 if (depthBits && stencilBits)
261 {
262 if (display->getFeatures().allowSeparatedDepthStencilBuffers.enabled)
263 {
264 mDepthFormat = display->getPixelFormat(kDefaultFrameBufferDepthFormatId);
265 mStencilFormat = display->getPixelFormat(kDefaultFrameBufferStencilFormatId);
266 }
267 else
268 {
269 // We must use packed depth stencil
270 mUsePackedDepthStencil = true;
271 mDepthFormat = display->getPixelFormat(kDefaultFrameBufferDepthStencilFormatId);
272 mStencilFormat = mDepthFormat;
273 }
274 }
275 else if (depthBits)
276 {
277 mDepthFormat = display->getPixelFormat(kDefaultFrameBufferDepthFormatId);
278 }
279 else if (stencilBits)
280 {
281 mStencilFormat = display->getPixelFormat(kDefaultFrameBufferStencilFormatId);
282 }
283}
284
285SurfaceMtl::~SurfaceMtl() {}
286
287void SurfaceMtl::destroy(const egl::Display *display)
288{
289 mColorTexture = nullptr;
290 mDepthTexture = nullptr;
291 mStencilTexture = nullptr;
292
293 mMSColorTexture = nullptr;
294
295 mColorRenderTarget.reset();
296 mColorManualResolveRenderTarget.reset();
297 mDepthRenderTarget.reset();
298 mStencilRenderTarget.reset();
299}
300
301egl::Error SurfaceMtl::initialize(const egl::Display *display)
302{
303 return egl::NoError();
304}
305
306FramebufferImpl *SurfaceMtl::createDefaultFramebuffer(const gl::Context *context,
307 const gl::FramebufferState &state)
308{
309 auto fbo = new FramebufferMtl(state, /* flipY */ false, /* backbuffer */ nullptr);
310
311 return fbo;
312}
313
314egl::Error SurfaceMtl::makeCurrent(const gl::Context *context)
315{
316 ContextMtl *contextMtl = mtl::GetImpl(context);
317 StartFrameCapture(contextMtl);
318
319 return egl::NoError();
320}
321
322egl::Error SurfaceMtl::unMakeCurrent(const gl::Context *context)
323{
324 ContextMtl *contextMtl = mtl::GetImpl(context);
325 contextMtl->flushCommandBuffer(mtl::WaitUntilScheduled);
326
327 StopFrameCapture();
328 return egl::NoError();
329}
330
331egl::Error SurfaceMtl::swap(const gl::Context *context)
332{
333 return egl::NoError();
334}

388EGLint SurfaceMtl::getWidth() const
389{
390 if (mColorTexture)
391 {
392 return static_cast<EGLint>(mColorTexture->widthAt0());
393 }
394 return 0;
395}

398{
399 if (mColorTexture)
400 {
401 return static_cast<EGLint>(mColorTexture->heightAt0());
402 }
403 return 0;
404}

407{
408 return EGL_FALSE;
409}

411EGLint SurfaceMtl::getSwapBehavior() const
412{
413 return EGL_BUFFER_PRESERVED;
414}
415
416angle::Result SurfaceMtl::initializeContents(const gl::Context *context,
417 const gl::ImageIndex &imageIndex)
418{
419 ASSERT(mColorTexture);
420 ContextMtl *contextMtl = mtl::GetImpl(context);
421
422 // Use loadAction=clear
423 mtl::RenderPassDesc rpDesc;
424 rpDesc.sampleCount = mColorTexture->samples();
425 rpDesc.numColorAttachments = 1;
426
427 mColorRenderTarget.toRenderPassAttachmentDesc(&rpDesc.colorAttachments[0]);
428 rpDesc.colorAttachments[0].loadAction = MTLLoadActionClear;
429 MTLClearColor black = {};
430 rpDesc.colorAttachments[0].clearColor =
431 mtl::EmulatedAlphaClearColor(black, mColorTexture->getColorWritableMask());
432 if (mDepthTexture)
433 {
434 mDepthRenderTarget.toRenderPassAttachmentDesc(&rpDesc.depthAttachment);
435 rpDesc.depthAttachment.loadAction = MTLLoadActionClear;
436 }
437 if (mStencilTexture)
438 {
439 mStencilRenderTarget.toRenderPassAttachmentDesc(&rpDesc.stencilAttachment);
440 rpDesc.stencilAttachment.loadAction = MTLLoadActionClear;
441 }
442 mtl::RenderCommandEncoder *encoder = contextMtl->getRenderPassCommandEncoder(rpDesc);
443 encoder->setStoreAction(MTLStoreActionStore);
444
445 return angle::Result::Continue;
446}
447
448angle::Result SurfaceMtl::getAttachmentRenderTarget(const gl::Context *context,
449 GLenum binding,
450 const gl::ImageIndex &imageIndex,
451 GLsizei samples,
452 FramebufferAttachmentRenderTarget **rtOut)
453{
454 ASSERT(mColorTexture);
455
456 switch (binding)
457 {
458 case GL_BACK:
459 *rtOut = &mColorRenderTarget;
460 break;
461 case GL_DEPTH:
462 *rtOut = mDepthFormat.valid() ? &mDepthRenderTarget : nullptr;
463 break;
464 case GL_STENCIL:
465 *rtOut = mStencilFormat.valid() ? &mStencilRenderTarget : nullptr;
466 break;
467 case GL_DEPTH_STENCIL:
468 // NOTE(hqle): ES 3.0 feature
469 UNREACHABLE();
470 break;
471 }
472
473 return angle::Result::Continue;
474}
475
476angle::Result SurfaceMtl::ensureCompanionTexturesSizeCorrect(const gl::Context *context,
477 const gl::Extents &size)
478{
479 ContextMtl *contextMtl = mtl::GetImpl(context);
480
481 ASSERT(mColorTexture);
482
483 if (mSamples > 1 && (!mMSColorTexture || mMSColorTexture->sizeAt0() != size))
484 {
485 mAutoResolveMSColorTexture =
486 contextMtl->getDisplay()->getFeatures().allowMultisampleStoreAndResolve.enabled;
487 ANGLE_TRY(CreateOrResizeTexture(context, mColorFormat, size.width, size.height, mSamples,
488 /** renderTargetOnly */ mAutoResolveMSColorTexture,
489 &mMSColorTexture));
490
491 if (mAutoResolveMSColorTexture)
492 {
493 // Use auto MSAA resolve at the end of render pass.
494 mColorRenderTarget.setImplicitMSTexture(mMSColorTexture);
495 }
496 else
497 {
498 mColorRenderTarget.setTexture(mMSColorTexture);
499 }
500 }
501
502 if (mDepthFormat.valid() && (!mDepthTexture || mDepthTexture->sizeAt0() != size))
503 {
504 ANGLE_TRY(CreateOrResizeTexture(context, mDepthFormat, size.width, size.height, mSamples,
505 /** renderTargetOnly */ false, &mDepthTexture));
506
507 mDepthRenderTarget.set(mDepthTexture, mtl::kZeroNativeMipLevel, 0, mDepthFormat);
508 }
509
510 if (mStencilFormat.valid() && (!mStencilTexture || mStencilTexture->sizeAt0() != size))
511 {
512 if (mUsePackedDepthStencil)
513 {
514 mStencilTexture = mDepthTexture;
515 }
516 else
517 {
518 ANGLE_TRY(CreateOrResizeTexture(context, mStencilFormat, size.width, size.height,
519 mSamples,
520 /** renderTargetOnly */ false, &mStencilTexture));
521 }
522
523 mStencilRenderTarget.set(mStencilTexture, mtl::kZeroNativeMipLevel, 0, mStencilFormat);
524 }
525
526 return angle::Result::Continue;
527}
528
529angle::Result SurfaceMtl::resolveColorTextureIfNeeded(const gl::Context *context)
530{
531 ASSERT(mMSColorTexture);
532 if (!mAutoResolveMSColorTexture)
533 {
534 // Manually resolve texture
535 ContextMtl *contextMtl = mtl::GetImpl(context);
536
537 mColorManualResolveRenderTarget.set(mColorTexture, mtl::kZeroNativeMipLevel, 0,
538 mColorFormat);
539 mtl::RenderCommandEncoder *encoder =
540 contextMtl->getRenderTargetCommandEncoder(mColorManualResolveRenderTarget);
541 ANGLE_TRY(contextMtl->getDisplay()->getUtils().blitColorWithDraw(
542 context, encoder, mColorFormat.actualAngleFormat(), mMSColorTexture));
543 contextMtl->endEncoding(true);
544 mColorManualResolveRenderTarget.reset();
545 }
546 return angle::Result::Continue;
547}
548
549// WindowSurfaceMtl implementation.
550WindowSurfaceMtl::WindowSurfaceMtl(DisplayMtl *display,
551 const egl::SurfaceState &state,
552 EGLNativeWindowType window,
553 const egl::AttributeMap &attribs)
554 : SurfaceMtl(display, state, attribs), mLayer((__bridge CALayer *)(window))
555{
556 // NOTE(hqle): Width and height attributes is ignored for now.
557 mCurrentKnownDrawableSize = CGSizeMake(0, 0);
558}
559
560WindowSurfaceMtl::~WindowSurfaceMtl() {}
561
562void WindowSurfaceMtl::destroy(const egl::Display *display)
563{
564 SurfaceMtl::destroy(display);
565
566 mCurrentDrawable = nil;
567 if (mMetalLayer && mMetalLayer.get() != mLayer)
568 {
569 // If we created metal layer in WindowSurfaceMtl::initialize(),
570 // we need to detach it from super layer now.
571 [mMetalLayer.get() removeFromSuperlayer];
572 }
573 mMetalLayer = nil;
574}
575
576egl::Error WindowSurfaceMtl::initialize(const egl::Display *display)
577{
578 egl::Error re = SurfaceMtl::initialize(display);
579 if (re.isError())
580 {
581 return re;
582 }
583
584 DisplayMtl *displayMtl = mtl::GetImpl(display);
585 id<MTLDevice> metalDevice = displayMtl->getMetalDevice();
586
587 StartFrameCapture(metalDevice, displayMtl->cmdQueue().get());
588
589 ANGLE_MTL_OBJC_SCOPE
590 {
591 if ([mLayer isKindOfClass:CAMetalLayer.class])
592 {
593 mMetalLayer.retainAssign(static_cast<CAMetalLayer *>(mLayer));
594 }
595 else
596 {
597 mMetalLayer = [[[CAMetalLayer alloc] init] ANGLE_MTL_AUTORELEASE];
598 mMetalLayer.get().frame = mLayer.frame;
599 }
600
601 mMetalLayer.get().device = metalDevice;
602 mMetalLayer.get().pixelFormat = mColorFormat.metalFormat;
603 mMetalLayer.get().framebufferOnly = NO; // Support blitting and glReadPixels
604
605#if TARGET_OS_OSX || TARGET_OS_MACCATALYST
606 // Autoresize with parent layer.
607 mMetalLayer.get().autoresizingMask = kCALayerWidthSizable | kCALayerHeightSizable;
608#endif
609
610 if (mMetalLayer.get() != mLayer)
611 {
612 mMetalLayer.get().contentsScale = mLayer.contentsScale;
613
614 [mLayer addSublayer:mMetalLayer.get()];
615 }
616
617 // ensure drawableSize is set to correct value:
618 mMetalLayer.get().drawableSize = mCurrentKnownDrawableSize = calcExpectedDrawableSize();
619 }
620
621 return egl::NoError();
622}
623
624FramebufferImpl *WindowSurfaceMtl::createDefaultFramebuffer(const gl::Context *context,
625 const gl::FramebufferState &state)
626{
627 auto fbo = new FramebufferMtl(state, /* flipY */ true, /* backbuffer */ this);
628
629 return fbo;
630}
631
632egl::Error WindowSurfaceMtl::swap(const gl::Context *context)
633{
634 ANGLE_TO_EGL_TRY(swapImpl(context));
635
636 return egl::NoError();
637}
638
639void WindowSurfaceMtl::setSwapInterval(EGLint interval)
640{
641#if TARGET_OS_OSX || TARGET_OS_MACCATALYST
642 mMetalLayer.get().displaySyncEnabled = interval != 0;
643#endif
644}
645
646// width and height can change with client window resizing
647EGLint WindowSurfaceMtl::getWidth() const
648{
649 return static_cast<EGLint>(mCurrentKnownDrawableSize.width);
650}
651
652EGLint WindowSurfaceMtl::getHeight() const
653{
654 return static_cast<EGLint>(mCurrentKnownDrawableSize.height);
655}
656
657EGLint WindowSurfaceMtl::getSwapBehavior() const
658{
659 return EGL_BUFFER_DESTROYED;
660}
661
662angle::Result WindowSurfaceMtl::initializeContents(const gl::Context *context,
663 const gl::ImageIndex &imageIndex)
664{
665 bool newDrawable;
666 ANGLE_TRY(ensureCurrentDrawableObtained(context, &newDrawable));
667
668 if (!newDrawable)
669 {
670 return angle::Result::Continue;
671 }
672
673 return SurfaceMtl::initializeContents(context, imageIndex);
674}
675
676angle::Result WindowSurfaceMtl::getAttachmentRenderTarget(const gl::Context *context,
677 GLenum binding,
678 const gl::ImageIndex &imageIndex,
679 GLsizei samples,
680 FramebufferAttachmentRenderTarget **rtOut)
681{
682 ANGLE_TRY(ensureCurrentDrawableObtained(context, nullptr));
683 ANGLE_TRY(ensureCompanionTexturesSizeCorrect(context));
684
685 return SurfaceMtl::getAttachmentRenderTarget(context, binding, imageIndex, samples, rtOut);
686}
687
688angle::Result WindowSurfaceMtl::ensureCurrentDrawableObtained(const gl::Context *context)
689{
690 return ensureCurrentDrawableObtained(context, nullptr);
691}
692angle::Result WindowSurfaceMtl::ensureCurrentDrawableObtained(const gl::Context *context,
693 bool *newDrawableOut)
694{
695 if (newDrawableOut)
696 {
697 *newDrawableOut = !mCurrentDrawable;
698 }
699
700 if (!mCurrentDrawable)
701 {
702 ANGLE_TRY(obtainNextDrawable(context));
703 }
704
705 return angle::Result::Continue;
706}
707
708angle::Result WindowSurfaceMtl::ensureCompanionTexturesSizeCorrect(const gl::Context *context)
709{
710 ASSERT(mMetalLayer);
711
712 gl::Extents size(static_cast<int>(mMetalLayer.get().drawableSize.width),
713 static_cast<int>(mMetalLayer.get().drawableSize.height), 1);
714
715 ANGLE_TRY(SurfaceMtl::ensureCompanionTexturesSizeCorrect(context, size));
716
717 return angle::Result::Continue;
718}
719
720angle::Result WindowSurfaceMtl::ensureColorTextureReadyForReadPixels(const gl::Context *context)
721{
722 ANGLE_TRY(ensureCurrentDrawableObtained(context, nullptr));
723
724 if (mMSColorTexture)
725 {
726 if (mMSColorTexture->isCPUReadMemNeedSync())
727 {
728 ANGLE_TRY(resolveColorTextureIfNeeded(context));
729 mMSColorTexture->resetCPUReadMemNeedSync();
730 }
731 }
732
733 return angle::Result::Continue;
734}
735
736CGSize WindowSurfaceMtl::calcExpectedDrawableSize() const
737{
738 CGSize currentLayerSize = mMetalLayer.get().bounds.size;
739 CGFloat currentLayerContentsScale = mMetalLayer.get().contentsScale;
740 CGSize expectedDrawableSize = CGSizeMake(currentLayerSize.width * currentLayerContentsScale,
741 currentLayerSize.height * currentLayerContentsScale);
742
743 return expectedDrawableSize;
744}
745
746bool WindowSurfaceMtl::checkIfLayerResized(const gl::Context *context)
747{
748 if (mMetalLayer.get() != mLayer && mMetalLayer.get().contentsScale != mLayer.contentsScale)
749 {
750 // Parent layer's content scale has changed, update Metal layer's scale factor.
751 mMetalLayer.get().contentsScale = mLayer.contentsScale;
752 }
753
754 CGSize currentLayerDrawableSize = mMetalLayer.get().drawableSize;
755 CGSize expectedDrawableSize = calcExpectedDrawableSize();
756
757 // NOTE(hqle): We need to compare the size against mCurrentKnownDrawableSize also.
758 // That is because metal framework might internally change the drawableSize property of
759 // metal layer, and it might become equal to expectedDrawableSize. If that happens, we cannot
760 // know whether the layer has been resized or not.
761 if (currentLayerDrawableSize.width != expectedDrawableSize.width ||
762 currentLayerDrawableSize.height != expectedDrawableSize.height ||
763 mCurrentKnownDrawableSize.width != expectedDrawableSize.width ||
764 mCurrentKnownDrawableSize.height != expectedDrawableSize.height)
765 {
766 // Resize the internal drawable texture.
767 mMetalLayer.get().drawableSize = mCurrentKnownDrawableSize = expectedDrawableSize;
768
769 return true;
770 }
771
772 return false;
773}
774
775angle::Result WindowSurfaceMtl::obtainNextDrawable(const gl::Context *context)
776{
777 ANGLE_MTL_OBJC_SCOPE
778 {
779 ContextMtl *contextMtl = mtl::GetImpl(context);
780
781 ANGLE_MTL_TRY(contextMtl, mMetalLayer);
782
783 // Check if layer was resized
784 if (checkIfLayerResized(context))
785 {
786 contextMtl->onBackbufferResized(context, this);
787 }
788
789 mCurrentDrawable.retainAssign([mMetalLayer nextDrawable]);
790 if (!mCurrentDrawable)
791 {
792 // The GPU might be taking too long finishing its rendering to the previous frame.
793 // Try again, indefinitely wait until the previous frame render finishes.
794 // TODO: this may wait forever here
795 mMetalLayer.get().allowsNextDrawableTimeout = NO;
796 mCurrentDrawable.retainAssign([mMetalLayer nextDrawable]);
797 mMetalLayer.get().allowsNextDrawableTimeout = YES;
798 }
799
800 if (!mColorTexture)
801 {
802 mColorTexture = mtl::Texture::MakeFromMetal(mCurrentDrawable.get().texture);
803 ASSERT(!mColorRenderTarget.getTexture());
804 mColorRenderTarget.setWithImplicitMSTexture(mColorTexture, mMSColorTexture,
805 mtl::kZeroNativeMipLevel, 0, mColorFormat);
806 }
807 else
808 {
809 mColorTexture->set(mCurrentDrawable.get().texture);
810 }
811
812 ANGLE_MTL_LOG("Current metal drawable size=%d,%d", mColorTexture->width(),
813 mColorTexture->height());
814
815 // Now we have to resize depth stencil buffers if required.
816 ANGLE_TRY(ensureCompanionTexturesSizeCorrect(context));
817
818 return angle::Result::Continue;
819 }
820}
821
822angle::Result WindowSurfaceMtl::swapImpl(const gl::Context *context)
823{
824 if (mCurrentDrawable)
825 {
826 ASSERT(mColorTexture);
827
828 ContextMtl *contextMtl = mtl::GetImpl(context);
829
830 if (mMSColorTexture)
831 {
832 ANGLE_TRY(resolveColorTextureIfNeeded(context));
833 }
834
835 contextMtl->present(context, mCurrentDrawable);
836
837 StopFrameCapture();
838 StartFrameCapture(contextMtl);
839
840 // Invalidate current drawable
841 mColorTexture->set(nil);
842 mCurrentDrawable = nil;
843 }
844
845 return angle::Result::Continue;
846}
847
848// OffscreenSurfaceMtl implementation
849OffscreenSurfaceMtl::OffscreenSurfaceMtl(DisplayMtl *display,
850 const egl::SurfaceState &state,
851 const egl::AttributeMap &attribs)
852 : SurfaceMtl(display, state, attribs)
853{
854 mSize = gl::Extents(attribs.getAsInt(EGL_WIDTH, 1), attribs.getAsInt(EGL_HEIGHT, 1), 1);
855}
856
857OffscreenSurfaceMtl::~OffscreenSurfaceMtl() {}
858
859void OffscreenSurfaceMtl::destroy(const egl::Display *display)
860{
861 SurfaceMtl::destroy(display);
862}
863
864egl::Error OffscreenSurfaceMtl::swap(const gl::Context *context)
865{
866 // Check for surface resize.
867 ANGLE_TO_EGL_TRY(ensureTexturesSizeCorrect(context));
868
869 return egl::NoError();
870}
871
872egl::Error OffscreenSurfaceMtl::bindTexImage(const gl::Context *context,
873 gl::Texture *texture,
874 EGLint buffer)
875{
876 ContextMtl *contextMtl = mtl::GetImpl(context);
877 contextMtl->flushCommandBuffer(mtl::WaitUntilScheduled);
878
879 // Initialize offscreen textures if needed:
880 ANGLE_TO_EGL_TRY(ensureTexturesSizeCorrect(context));
881
882 return egl::NoError();
883}
884
885egl::Error OffscreenSurfaceMtl::releaseTexImage(const gl::Context *context, EGLint buffer)
886{
887 ContextMtl *contextMtl = mtl::GetImpl(context);
888
889 if (mMSColorTexture)
890 {
891 ANGLE_TO_EGL_TRY(resolveColorTextureIfNeeded(context));
892 }
893
894 // NOTE(hqle): Should we finishCommandBuffer or flush is enough?
895 contextMtl->flushCommandBuffer(mtl::WaitUntilScheduled);
896 return egl::NoError();
897}
898
899angle::Result OffscreenSurfaceMtl::getAttachmentRenderTarget(
900 const gl::Context *context,
901 GLenum binding,
902 const gl::ImageIndex &imageIndex,
903 GLsizei samples,
904 FramebufferAttachmentRenderTarget **rtOut)
905{
906 // Initialize offscreen textures if needed:
907 ANGLE_TRY(ensureTexturesSizeCorrect(context));
908
909 return SurfaceMtl::getAttachmentRenderTarget(context, binding, imageIndex, samples, rtOut);
910}
911
912angle::Result OffscreenSurfaceMtl::ensureTexturesSizeCorrect(const gl::Context *context)
913{
914 if (!mColorTexture || mColorTexture->sizeAt0() != mSize)
915 {
916 ANGLE_TRY(CreateOrResizeTexture(context, mColorFormat, mSize.width, mSize.height, 1,
917 /** renderTargetOnly */ false, &mColorTexture));
918
919 mColorRenderTarget.set(mColorTexture, mtl::kZeroNativeMipLevel, 0, mColorFormat);
920 }
921
922 return ensureCompanionTexturesSizeCorrect(context, mSize);
923}
924
925// PBufferSurfaceMtl implementation
926PBufferSurfaceMtl::PBufferSurfaceMtl(DisplayMtl *display,
927 const egl::SurfaceState &state,
928 const egl::AttributeMap &attribs)
929 : OffscreenSurfaceMtl(display, state, attribs)
930{}
931
932void PBufferSurfaceMtl::setFixedWidth(EGLint width)
933{
934 mSize.width = width;
935}
936
937void PBufferSurfaceMtl::setFixedHeight(EGLint height)
938{
939 mSize.height = height;
940}
